title: Kylie Jenner and Drake 'had an attraction' while together at his birthday bash
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner and rapper Drake have reportedly 'had an attraction' after spending much of his birthday bash together.

The 22-year-old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has recently split from boyfriend Travis Scott and seemed to catch the eye of Drake on his 33rd birthday.

Us Weekly has reported that the pair 'had a connection' as they enjoyed each other's company at the party.

The billionaire make-up mogul sparked rumours of a romance by being 'attached to the hip' of Drake, as she helped celebrate his big day.

An insider told the website: "She spent the most time near Drake and his friends.

(Image: Kylie Jenner/Instagram)

(Image: GC Images)

"Kylie was rapping to songs and dancing with her friends while she was next to Drake, but they weren’t dancing together, they seemed to have a connection though."

It has been reported that guests at the bash had commented on their 'attraction' for each other as they laughed and joked together.

The source continued: "They were joking around and Kylie was laughing. She seemed to be really happy and in a great mood and her and Drake seemed very comfortable with each other.

"There seemed to be an attraction there."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: GC Images)

Since Kylie split from Travis, who is the father of her daughter Stormi Webster, she is thought to be "living her best single life."

If Kylie and Drake were to hook up, it could prove a little awkward at Kardashian family reunions.

The rapper has a long standing beef with Kanye West after the Yeezy rapper was upset that Drake was following Kim Kardashian on Instagram .

(Image: Instagram)

Kanye has recently looked to bury the hatchet though and he told Apple Beats 1 radio: "I walk over to Drake's house with no security and leave my phone number, like, 'Here's my phone number.'

"I'm not trying to ring the door bell, he might be busy. He got a studio in there, just think he recording at all times".

Kylie was just one of many stars celebrating Drake's 33rd birthday at Goya studios in Hollywood, with Adele and the rapper's ex, Rihanna , also enjoying the party atmosphere.

description: Kylie Jenner took steps to put ex Travis Scott out of her mind by 'spending a lot of time' with Drake at his birthday party
